articles.description: As the experimental Covid-19 vaccine being developed by Moderna Therapeutics has begun advancing through studies, it has found an advocate: trial volunteer Ian Haydon, a 29-year-old in Seattle, STAT News reports.
articles.content: Patients in clinical trials are usually faceless. But as the experimental Covid-19 vaccine being developed by Moderna Therapeutics has begun advancing through studies, it has found a much more visibl… [+8821 chars]

articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: Scientists identify obscure protein responsible for advanced breast cancer - Medical Xpress
articles.description: South Australian scientists have made a critical breakthrough, discovering how an obscure protein causes breast cancer to develop and grow more quickly.
articles.content:
South Australian scientists have made a critical breakthrough, discovering how an obscure protein causes breast cancer to develop and grow more quickly.
